subject: Re: Greetings from a New Member
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Nellie,

That one file "What are you to me?"  A man answers clearly i believe 
says "Nothing".  That is a real EVP, probably a class A and that did 
not come from the box.  That was spoken directly into your recorder.  
I get them on occasion, i feel that only happens with a grounded 
spirit in a location and is confused by the box....Maybe (I don't 
Know)  It sounds somewhat logical though.

Anyway, Great Files and welcome to the group !!!

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Nellie Kampmann" <rednellie@...> 
wrote:
>
> Hi!  My name is Nellie and I am a new convert to ITC work.  I've 
been
> doing evps for a few years with a fair amount of success.  One of 
the
> things I have been experimenting with is using music.  I play music
> from the lifetimes of the spirits I'm trying to communicate with to
> get the spirits intrigued enough to talk more.  I took a quick look 
at
> some of the old messages here, and will definitely have to 
experiment
> with some of the suggestions you all have had about using music as
> more of a carrier wave to make it easier for them to speak through.
> 
> What drew me to this group, though, is that I just made a Radio 
Shack
> hack a couple of days ago and have been completely stunned by the
> results.  I'm getting more communications through it in 15 minutes
> than I would usually get in evps over hours.  I am absolutely blown
> away.  Even more interesting is that a spirit in my house who I've
> never been able to get evps from is quite the chatterbox through the
> hack.  I have a couple of my first files in the folder Nellie's 
Files
> that I found particularly interesting.
> 
> http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Nellie%27s%20Files/
> 
> Anyway, I am looking forward to learning from/with you all.
> 
> Nellie Kampmann
>
